text: Stefano Zappalà (6 February 1941 – 15 April 2018) was an Italian politician. He was born in Aci Bonaccorsi, Italy. He was a Member of the European Parliament for Central with the Forza Italia, part of the European People's Party and is vice-chair of the European Parliament's Committee on Civil Liberties, Justice and Home Affairs. He is a substitute for the Committee on the Internal Market and Consumer Protection, a member of the Delegation for relations with the Palestinian Legislative Council and a substitute for the Delegation to the EU-Kazakhstan, EU-Kyrgyzstan and EU-Uzbekistan Parliamentary Cooperation Committees, and for relations with Tajikistan, Turkmenistan and Mongolia. Zappalà died from respiratory failure in Latina, aged 77.Morto Stefano Zappalà, tra i fondatori di Forza Italia == References == Category:1941 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Politicians from Sicily Category:MEPs for Italy Category:Deaths from respiratory failure
title: Stefano Zappalà
